unnormalised: Sach mann, me chuus shuruuatas peth stock market-as manz invest karanas manz beyhad hichkichich karān. Myon dost Rakesh chus me mutaavaasil sambhaavit wapasiaaran hund kissaah karaaan, khaas karith Reliance-as manz yiman companyan hund yih rate chhuss as paani Rs. 2500 aasun. Tim kor me tasyaar aafnu portfolio yo chhuss sirif 6 mahinayan manz 15% vatān! Punn me kor sirif ek kam mikdaar invest, shayad ₹5000, Tata Motors manz. Aas vach, taqreeban 1 saal peth, yih dikhaavaan chus achchhee nafaah, tai me chus ziyadaa milaavanukh sochan, shayad SBI stocks-an nish dekhun aasun aindis. Baqaydah intizaar korum bazaras manz zaraa durust karanukh!
normalised: Sach manov, me chuus shuruee'at-e-hisyan bazaar-e-andar sarmaya kari'yane manz bahoot heechkichahat. Mea doh Rakesh chuus mei path yee wanaan kee wapas milanuk imkaan chhu, khaas kar Reliance jesyaan companyaan andar yim rupee dui hazar panch sau ke nazdeek khareed va frokht kari'yane chhas. Teme chuus mei panun portfolio dechhawoon yus pandreh feesad sirf chhe maheenyaan andar badeyo! Baavujood, me chuus sirf thoode paise sarmaya kaeri, shaayad rupee panch hazar, Tata Motors andar. Haal, taqreeban ek saal peth, yee chhu manzool munafa dechhaan, taa me chus sochan mazeed jamaa karanuk, shaayad S-B-I stocks dekhi'yanech. Bazaar thoodeh theekh honech intizaar karanai!
